## ProgramBuilder.select() method

Same as the select builtin function in WGSL, only valid for WebGPU device

**Signature:**

```typescript
select(x: number | PBShaderExp, y: number | PBShaderExp, cond: boolean | PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | number \| [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |
|  y | number \| [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |
|  cond | boolean \| [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)
